subject: Preliminary Budget Review - Q3 2024
body:
Hi Bob,

Hope you're having a good week.

I've attached the preliminary budget figures for Q3 2024. Could you take a look and let me know if you have any initial concerns or questions? We should schedule a quick meeting to discuss.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Re: Preliminary Budget Review - Q3 2024
body:
Hi Alice,

Thanks for sharing the budget figures. I'll review them today and get back to you with my comments. Let's aim to schedule the meeting for Thursday.

Best,
Bob

subject: Re: Preliminary Budget Review - Q3 2024
body:
Hi Bob,

Thursday works for me. Let me know what time suits you best, and I’ll block my calendar.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Re: Preliminary Budget Review - Q3 2024
body:
Hi Alice,

How about Thursday at 3 PM? Let me know if that works for you.

Best,
Bob

subject: [Confirmed] Preliminary Budget Review - Q3 2024 Meeting Time
body:
Hi Bob,

Thursday at 3 PM works perfectly. I’ll send out a calendar invite shortly.

Thanks,
Alice
